thread.title: Kate Upton: No sex with Justin Verlander before games
thread.title_full: Kate Upton: No sex with Justin Verlander before games

author: Sara Harris (sharris@sportingnews.com)
title: Kate Upton: No sex with Justin Verlander before games
text:
February 23, 2017 1:57pm EST February 23, 2017 1:50pm EST Kate Upton has revealed Justin Verlander's strict rules for sex. (Getty Images) 
Updated at 1:57 p.m. ET 
Updated at 1:57 p.m. ET 
Kate Upton has revealed Justin Verlander's strict rules for sex. 
During an appearance on Bravo's "Watch What Happens Live" on Wednesday night, the engaged model apparently didn't mind sharing intimate information about her relationship with the Detroit Tigers pitcher. 
FOSTER: MLB must shed its 'boring' label to attract new fans 
"There's no sex before a game. Absolutely none," said Upton. "And then, also what I just found out is, if he plays too well, there’s no sex after, either. He’s exhausted. Kind of a buzzkill for me.” 
Upton also revealed Verlander's reaction to her controversial tweets about him not receiving the AL Cy Young Award . 
She said she wrote the tweets while Verlander was still on TV. 
“I think his first reaction was a little bit surprised that I had already sent it, but overall he loved it,” she said. Watch This
